entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections late in the evening and overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 24 April 2023
